TopicTitle: How to change Unanswered to Answered

Articles.Content:
Changing the [unanswered] tag on your thread is quite simple, once you know what you're doing. First, go to your thread and click the Edit Post button on your original post. The editor will appear, offering you several options:

[TABLE=width: 700, align: center]

<tbody>[TR]

[TD][/TD]

[/TR]

</tbody>[/TABLE]

Click the Go Advanced button to be taken to a brand new editor page, with the options you need to change the thread's title, and (more importantly) its tag.

[TABLE=width: 700, align: center]

<tbody>[TR]

[TD][/TD]

[/TR]

</tbody>[/TABLE]

Click the Prefix drop-down list, and select the [Answered!] thread tag. Then, scroll down past the editor to find the Save Changes button and click it.

Voila!

If you find anything else about the forums baffling, you may find the answers you seek in the Forum FAQ.

Edited July 6, 2014 by Supernovy
